Description:
In this place, a turtle man is napping in front of a huge shell that seems to be his home.

He rests in a hammock near a carefully cultivated garden of exotic seaweeds. Even though you don't know much about these particular seaweeds, it's clear they require a lot of work and knowledge to flourish like that. You wonder how useful they might be for your mission.

You could wake him and ask if he can spare some, or you could try to gather them quietly without disturbing the old creature.
DescriptionAction: Will you awaken the old turtle man from his peaceful sleep to ask for his help, or will you risk taking from his precious garden without his knowledge?

    "SSRewardText": "The turtle man jumps from his hammock and tells you that he will send help to the Sahti at once. \r\n\nHe was expecting something like this to happen and has a good provision of the seaweed that the Sahti need.     "SSRewardText": "The turtle man is old and sleeping soundly. You easily take some of the seaweeds that you know may benefit you in the future. \r\n\nThere are some exotic seaweeds that you could sell for a good amount of gold, but since you don’t know if it’s safe to pick them, you decide to stick to the ones you recognize. \r\n\nOnce you have a handful, it's time for you to leave. These algae are worth a nice sum of gold. \r\n\nIt’s not that you fear the reaction of the turtle man, but it would be better for everyone involved if he doesn’t catch you with your hands dirty.",

    "SSCRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSCRewardText": "The turtle man is old and sleeping soundly. You easily take some of the seaweeds that you know may benefit you in the future. \r\n\nThere are some exotic seaweeds that you could sell for a good amount of gold, as you know that some of these algae were quite popular some time ago and were bought at high prices by nobles from all over the world. Just a handful of these algae are worth a nice sum of gold! \r\n\nYou leave once you have enough. It would be better for everyone involved if the turtle man doesn’t catch you with your hands dirty.",

    "FLRequirementUnlock": "",
    "FLRequirementUnlock2": "",
    "FLRewardHealthFlat": 0,
    "FLRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "FLRewardText": "The turtle man is old and sleeping soundly, but you manage to awaken him while trying to get some seaweeds. \r\n\nThe turtle man is scared at first, but once you explain why you are doing it, you see the look of disappointment in his eyes. \r\n\nAt this moment, you realize that it would have been better to awaken him and directly ask for his help. \r\n\nNow, with all the sorrow and shame you feel, your only option is to leave without looking directly at the turtle man.",
    "FLRewardTier": "",
    "FLShopList": "",
    "FLSupplyReward": 0,

    "FLUnlockSteamAchievement": "",

    "FLCCorruptItemSlot": "None",

    "FLCRequirementLock": "",
    "FLCRequirementUnlock": "",
    "FLCRequirementUnlock2": "",
    "FLCRewardHealthFlat": 0,
    "FLCRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "FLCRewardText": "The turtle man is old and sleeping soundly, but you wake him with your screams of agony. \r\n\nIt happens that you stepped on the part of his garden where he is nurturing poisonous algae, and the seaweeds reacted to your presence. \r\n\nHe rushes to aid you and treats your wounds, but while doing so, you have to listen to him lecture you about how stealing from others is wrong. \r\n\nHe lets you leave, but you still feel the effects of the poison and fear that it may affect you in the future.",
    "FLCRewardTier": "",
    "FLCShopList": "",
    "FLCSupplyReward": 0,
    "FLCUnlockClass": "",

}

    "SSRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSRewardText": "Sigrun gets close to the sleeping turtle man and awakens him. He is glad to see her and she introduces him as Bernard, the best alchemist in this side of the world to the rest of the group. \r\n\nBernard is a little embarrassed for such words and tells you that she is very kind and any friend of Sigrun is welcome at his home. \r\n\nAfter you explain him your mission, Bernard offers you some supplies and wish you good luck with your journey. He says that he would love to go with you but for now he must stay home, as he fears that the obelisk influence may affect the Loa and the islands balance. ",

    "SSRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSRewardText": "(Sigrun): “Bernard! The elder needs your help. The disease is spreading fast. He sent us to look for you.” \r\n\nThe turtle man awakens and jumps from his hammock with a skill you definitely were not expecting. He and Sigrun talk for a while, and then Bernard proceeds to prepare the seaweeds that the Sahti need. He apologizes to you as he has a lot of work to do and doesn’t have time to invite you for some tea. \r\n\nSigrun tells you not to be fooled by his appearance, as he is the best alchemist on this side of the world. He is reliable, and you can continue your journey knowing that the Sahti will be saved.",
